forumNotes.author: Tokener
forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display§ion=screenshot&id=639) **File Name** : Grubmenu-xTender **File Submitter** : [Tokener](http://reboot.pro/index.php?showuser=21675 "") **File Submitted** : 16 Aug 2021 **File Updated** : *22 Aug 2021* **File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&showcat=7 "") -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Use this file if you are using Grub4DOS / (for UEFI) boot menu and want to extend the boot menu. Grubmenu-xTender has different templates available to write the appropriate command lines for different file types (VHD / ISO / WIM) to G4E config-file **menu.lst** . Since boot files, even of the same type, are very often different, it is possible that the corresponding command lines differ from the standard. However, there is a correct command line chain for most files, which is also documented. Take a look at this [related topic](http://reboot.pro/index.php?showtopic=22547 "") where a short desciption of usage is given. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Regards Tokener

Credits to developers: yaya**,** a1ive and G4E development team for creating and sharing 'GRUB4DOS for UEFI' (G4E) erwan.l for creating and sharing 'vMount' friends \& team @reboot.pro Credits to icon providers: [https://findicons.com](https://findicons.com "External link") [https://www.flaticon.com](https://www.flaticon.com "External link") [Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&showfile=639 "")
